explanation: [SOCAR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR) (State Oil Company of the Republic of Azerbaijan), commonly known as SOCAR, is a fully state-owned national oil and gas company based in Azerbaijan. SOCAR is heavily involved in the exploration, production, refining, and distribution of oil and natural gas. The company operates oil refineries, gas processing plants, and export pipelines. Additionally, SOCAR owns fuel filling stations under its brand in several countries. Its core operations are heavily centered around the fossil fuel industry, making it a significant player in the sector.
